DOC.brief_summary: This study includes a behavioral educational intervention that focuses on healthy eating, physical activity and glucose management during pregnancy and post partum among women newly diagnosed with gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM).
DOC.brief_title: A Transgenerational e-Intervention for Gestational Diabetics and Their Offspring
DOC.detailed_description: This is a pilot trial in which 50 women newly diagnosed with gestational diabetes are randomized to either one of two groups: 1) active internet intervention or 2)Usual Care (Self-directed) educational intervention. The primary pregnancy outcome is change in A1C. The primary postpartum outcome is weight.
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed with gestational diabetes Confirmed singleton pregnancy 2432 weeks gestation age Planning to deliver within the study area Preexisting diabetes (type 1 or 2) Nonenglish speaking Not planning to deliver in the study area
